title: Requirements Gathering
description: Gather and document project requirements from clients, stakeholders, and domain experts. This will include defining the scope of the project, understanding user needs, and identifying any potential constraints. In addition, the task requires researching best practices for requirements gathering in AI-based translation systems.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the translation system, including hardware and software components.

title: Backend Development Task Decomposition
description: Break down the backend development tasks into smaller subtasks.

title: Frontend Development Task Decomposition
description: Break down the frontend development tasks into smaller subtasks.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design the database schema that will store translation data and system metadata.

title: Backend Development Implementation
description: Implement the backend system according to the decomposed tasks.

title: Frontend Development Implementation
description: Implement the frontend system according to the decomposed tasks.

title: Integration Testing
description: Test the integration of the backend and frontend systems.

title: Comprehensive Deployment Strategy for LinguaFusionPro Translation System
description: Plan a comprehensive deployment strategy for the LinguaFusionPro translation system, considering factors such as scalability, redundancy, and security. This plan should include details on infrastructure requirements (hardware, software, cloud services), rollout methodologies (staging environments, phased releases), and disaster recovery strategies (backup plans, failover mechanisms).

title: System Deployment
description: Deploy the translation system according to the deployment plan.
